LET’S TALK ABOUT YOU AND V
settings.content_lt: Most cleansers and soaps have a pH that ranges from 9 to 10.
settings.content_lb: This can cause an overgrowth of bad bacteria that leads to irritation.
settings.content_rt: A healthy vaginal pH is acidic, somewhere between 3.8 to 4.5.
settings.content_rb: Queen V products have a healthy pH of 4.5 to 5.

settings.title:

dirty Word

settings.heading: LET'S NOT BEAT AROUND THE BUSH.
settings.body-text:
Feminine wellness can be confusing and embarrassing. We know because we’ve been there.

We’ve created an easy-to-follow three-step process to maintaining, healing and enjoying your V.

We’re a female-powered team focused on normalizing the conversations surrounding women’s health.

settings.title: LET’S TALK ABOUT YOU AND V
settings.content_lt: Most cleansers and soaps have a pH that ranges from 9 to 10.
settings.content_lb: This can cause an overgrowth of bad bacteria that leads to irritation.
settings.content_rt: A healthy vaginal pH is acidic, somewhere between 3.8 to 4.5.
settings.content_rb: Queen V products have a healthy pH of 4.5 to 5.
settings.link_text: Add queen v to your routine

settings.quote: Queen V makes an on-the-go refresh effortless.
Queen V exudes an air of fun and playfulness.
Bath treats that deliver soothing properties without the worry of added pigments.

settings.title: WANT TO WRITE FOR OUR BLOG?
LET’S TALK ABOUT YOU AND V
settings.content_lt: Most cleansers and soaps have a pH that ranges from 9 to 10.
settings.content_lb: This can cause an overgrowth of bad bacteria that leads to irritation.
settings.content_rt: A healthy vaginal pH is acidic, somewhere between 3.8 to 4.5.
settings.content_rb: Queen V products have a healthy pH of 4.5 to 5.

settings.heading: #MAINTAINYOURV
settings.bodyText: Queen V's MAINTAIN products keep your V fresh with the power of healthy pH levels. Whether you are out and about or cozy on the couch, Queen has your back (and front).

settings.heading: #ENJOYYOURV
settings.bodyText: Part-time wingwoman, full-time bodyguard, Queen V's ENJOY line will keep your V fun, flirty and safe from harmful bacteria.

settings.heading: #HEALYOURV
settings.bodyText: We know that dealing with vaginal health can be embarrassing and stressful. Queen V's HEAL products are effective remedies that will soothe period pain and kick uncomfortable infections to the curb.

settings.prod-subheader: PH-BALANCED STARTER KIT THAT CLEANSES, BALANCES AND REFRESHES YOUR QUEEN V SO YOU CAN STAY ON TOP
